Wasn’t feeling very well today so I ended up staying home from school and made this. Feedback would be appreciated!

item.title: Rarefactions - Lex [Experimental]
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Liked.

Not really Experimental, though.
Seems more like straight Electronic, to my ears.

I’m not sure there’s enough there to represent a decent standalone track, but there’s enough there to form a decent foundation for further development.

 

I do think the drums are a little loud

The kick certainly is. More than a little.
Feels likes it’s not bedded into the track.

Read full topic
